name: opengento/module-country-store-redirect
description: This module will redirect the customers regarding their country of origin, on their first visit session.

suggest.opengento/module-country-store-redirect-: This module add the country store resolver from MagePal GeoIp module.
This module add the country store resolver from Mageplaza GeoIP module.
This module add the country store resolver from Magefan GeoIp module.
This module add the country store resolver from Mooore Digital GeoIp module.
suggest.opengento/module-country-store-switcher: This module will allows the customers to switch of store by country instead of name/language.
suggest.opengento/module-country-store-phone: This module add the phone number field to the country data object.
